ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet -Reply
ygData.msgSnippet: I have dueled a Barbarian Warrior, 22nd lvl, and a Ogre Warrior, 21st lvl, and have won both matches.  The Ogre had the most HP at a little over 780. Talarin
ygData.messageBody:
I have dueled a Barbarian Warrior, 22nd lvl, and a Ogre Warrior, 21st lvl,
and have won both matches. The Ogre had the most HP at a little over 780.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: Fraser G Heath <fheath@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 5:23 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Ice Comet -Reply


> From: "Fraser G Heath" <fheath@...>
>
> So, the max damage that you can do will be 1050dmg assuming no fizzles,
interupts, and no resistance..Im not sure what a warriors HP is like at that
level, as I have never played one myself (anybody help here?) but I could
see you being In a lot of trouble when dueling one..if you get a root of and
manage to take him down from afar with remaining mana all well and good but
wizards are a very feeble class one on one when it comes to fighting face to
face, you end up exhausting your mana trying to get a quick root in and then
backing off to cast dmg spells again..
>
> >>> "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...> 14/May/1999 10:17am >>>
> From: "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...>
>
> As a 22nd lvl wizard, I most definitely have to disagree with you.
Wizards
> can make all the difference on whether your group survives or not. I can
do
> 175 dmg with one cast. I can cast this spell 6 times. Believe me, fights
> go a lot faster and safer with a wizard that can deal out that much dmg.
> And, when you get 2 wizards in a group, well you can imagine the
devastation
> that can happen.
>
> Lets not forget our group teleportation spells either. Not to mention, we
> are the ONLY class that can teleport a group to an alternate plane.
>
> So, your statement that "parties can't be bothered with wizards" is
totally
> inaccurate. I have never had a problem finding a group to adventure with.
> And, like Valacian stated, I would be more than happy to duel a barbarian
> warrior with dual wield.
>
> Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
